name: Koi
description: KOI is an award-winning exploration adventure game that details the story of a small koi on a grand adventure
minimum_requirements: OS: Window 7 sp1 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 7/8/10 Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+ DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: Any
